content.rendered:
Directed by Mani Ratnam.

Written by Mani Ratnam.

Cast Karthi(Varun Chakrapani ‘VC’). Aditi Rao Hydari(Dr. Leela Abraham). Shraddha Srinath(Girija Kapoor). RJ Balaji(Dr. Illyaas Hussain). Rukmini Vijayakumar(Dr. Nidhi). Delhi Ganesh(Col. Mithran) . Syed Aalam(Lateef). Siva Ananth(Girish Reddy). Midhat Khan(Revenue Officer). Ekansh Kumar(Danny). K.P.A.C. Lalitha(Achamma). Simran Lulla(Leela’s Colleagues 2). Dhyana Madan(Rohini). Jyothi Nair(Dholak Lady). Nithyashri(Sitara). Ashish Patil(Leela’s Colleagues 1). Harish Raj(Madhusoodhanan Pillai). Vikram Raja(Varun Chakrapani ‘VC’ Friend). Dharma Raman(Leela’s Mother). Charan Saluja(Store Keeper). Mir Sarwar(Muzaffar Khan). Vipin Sharma(Leela’s Father). Yashhraj Singh(Jijo). Aasheesha Srinivasan(Leela’s Colleagues 3). Mayanand Thakur(Librarian). Divya Yeleswarapu(Leela’s Colleagues 4)

Language Tamil.

Producers Siva Ananth. Alek Conic. Bejoy Nambiar. Mani Ratnam. Shalini Shankar.

Production Madras Talkies.
